SEARCH
Package at.ac.tuwien.sepm.assignment.individual.service

Interface OwnerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OwnerServiceImpl
public interface OwnerService
Service for working with owners.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    OwnerDto
    create(OwnerCreateDto newOwner)
    Create a new owner in the persistent data store.
    Map<Long,OwnerDto>
    getAllById(Collection<Long> ids)
    Fetch all owners referenced by the IDs in ids

  • Method Details

    • getById

      OwnerDto getById(long id) throws NotFoundException
      Fetch an owner from the persistent data store by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the owner to get
      Returns:
      the owner with the given ID
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no owner with the given ID exists in the persistent data store

    • getAllById

      Map<Long,OwnerDto> getAllById(Collection<Long> ids) throws NotFoundException
      Fetch all owners referenced by the IDs in ids
      Parameters:
      ids - the IDs of the owners, that shoud be fetched
      Returns:
      a map that contains the requested owners with their IDs as key
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if any of the requested owners is not found

    • search

      Stream<OwnerDto> search(OwnerSearchDto searchParameters)
      Search for owners matching the criteria in searchParameters.

      A owner is considered matched, if its name contains searchParameters.name as a substring. The returned stream of owners never contains more than searchParameters.maxAmount elements, even if there would be more matches in the persistent data store.

      Parameters:
      searchParameters - object containing the search parameters to match
      Returns:
      a stream containing owners matching the criteria in searchParameters

    • create

      OwnerDto create(OwnerCreateDto newOwner) throws ValidationException
      Create a new owner in the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      newOwner - the data for the new owner
      Returns:
      the owner, that was just newly created in the persistent data store
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the owner does pass the validation procedure
